entries.npc_1_1: Hey there, kid. You look like you have an eye for detail. Have you ever thought of being a "Professional Eye-Witness"? If so, I have some advice for you. Interested?
entries.npc_2_1: I knew you were that kind of guy. Look... the Empire has set up shop a little ways up the road. Let's just say they know of me and won't let me within 1000m of the place. You though can get a good look around there, then one day when I run a story on it, I'll look you up, got it? Here's where you can find it.
entries.npc_3_1: What's wrong, kid? Are you scared of the truth? Or perhaps you just can't handle it?
entries.npc_4_1: Well, as you can tell by looking at me, I'm a journalist. I write for all of the major News HoloStations throughout the galaxy, and am well known for my surprise exposes. Matter of fact, right now I'm planning one and you can be part of it! Interested?
entries.npc_reset: Well, okay. Maybe some other time.
entries.npc_work_1: Did you locate the Imperial Stronghold?
entries.player_2_1: Ummm.. No thanks... I'm leaving now.
entries.player_3_1: Hold on. What are you talking about?
entries.player_reset: No. I've decided to stay away from it for the time being.
entries.player_sorry: I'm on my way there right now.
entries.waypoint_description_1: The Empire has gone to great lengths to construct this outpost, but no one knows what it's for. Perhaps you might be the one to find out.
